samba.description: A lively Brazilian dance with African roots, characterized by rapid steps and rhythmic hip movements

rumba.description: A slow, romantic Cuban dance often called the 'dance of love'

chaChaCha.description: A playful, flirtatious dance with Cuban origins, characterized by its syncopated steps

englishWaltz.description: A smooth, elegant ballroom dance in 3/4 time with long, flowing movements

vienneseWaltz.description: A faster version of the waltz with continuous turns and rotational movements

foxtrot.description: A smooth, progressive dance characterized by long, continuous flowing movements

salsa.description: A lively partner dance with Cuban and Puerto Rican roots, featuring intricate turn patterns

bachata.description: A romantic dance from the Dominican Republic with simple steps and sensual hip motion

kizomba.description: A sensual, smooth partner dance from Angola with close connection and subtle movements

blues.description: A slow, expressive dance focused on musicality and connection between partners

disco.description: A high-energy dance style popularized in the 1970s with flashy moves and rhythmic steps

jive.description: An energetic dance based on swing with fast kicks and flicks

rnr.description: Rock and Roll dance with acrobatic elements and lively movements

merengue.description: A simple, fun dance from the Dominican Republic with a marching rhythm

sirtaki.description: A popular Greek dance that starts slow and gradually increases in pace

header.title: Naturally Dance
header.description: is a dance association that promotes dance! We prepare participants for the dance floor in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

kizomba.title: The 1st Kizomba Flash mob in Serbia
kizomba.description: Naturally Dance designed the choreography and realized the project Kizomba dance Flash mob - Belgrade, Serbia in which we promoted the culture of Africa with the culture of Serbia in Belgrade.
